group_1.textCenter: It has to be at this riverbed...
Ah, here is it, the fish pond!
Here at the Kamihama Stream Fishing Center,@they release fish they raise into the river.
I will have to pay money...@But I can catch that fish here, too...

group_1.textLeft: Come on! Charu! Pick already!!
Shuuush! You're being loud, Ryouko!@The fish are going to get away!
M-my bad...

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:304701:cheek_0][chara:304701:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:304701:lipSynch_1]Ah, we're fine. The beautiful fish@have not swam away.

group_1.textLeft: Thank goodness~

group_1.textRight: Rather they seem to be gathering.@They must love Ryouko's voice.
The hell's up with that? S'like they're@stained with wordly desires.
Hehe, guess they can't help it,@huh, you little weirdos.
Come listen to my voice!

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad you're a good sport about it,@Ryouko.

group_1.textRight: Oh? You are all...from the Tokime clan...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Who are you...?@That is not a Kamihama uniform.
You must be from Promised Blood.
What?! She got friends with her?!
You come to kidnap me or something?!@Speak!

group_1.textRight: Th-there has been a misunderstanding!
I am fed up with being mistaken@for Promised Blood.
Come now, do you not remember me?

group_1.textLeft: Ahhh! I do!

group_1.textRight: Then he probably tried to learn more@about Diviners, but they closed the gate to him.
This is the first time I'm hearing@about this.

group_1.textLeft: I'd forgotten about it too, until now.
That time you met me and Shizuka@at the Coordinator's...
You are from Promised Blood!

group_1.textRight: That is quite a vague memory you have!@It was all Minami's fault!

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, that's right...
We mistook you for someone@in Promised Blood...

group_1.textRight: And on top of that, the actual members@then began a quarrel with me.
I come to Kamihama, and suddenly I have@the worst reputation in the city.

group_1.textLeft: I know, I'm sorry...@I made things more complicated saying that...
I was being overly cautious myself.@Do pardon me.
That was inexcusable of us...

group_1.textRight: N-no.
You seemed to be in some trouble,@so there was no helping it.
But enough of the past!@Are all of you fishing?

group_1.textLeft: You got it. I fell asleep during@this morning's meditation,
so the head priest told me as punishment,@I'd have to go out and fish.
Nah ha ha!!
I just tagged along since I thought@it would be interesting.
I came for the same reason.
By learning the geography of Kamihama and now@this river, I believe my understanding of nature@will deepen.

group_1.textRight: I was hopin' Shizuka would've joined;@she's pretty good at fishing.

group_1.textLeft: Shizuka just slept right in@the middle of meditation.

group_1.textRight: That priest...
He doesn't have the balls to punish@the head of the family.

group_1.textLeft: Human society is difficult...
Oh, it's Shizuka; she just woke up and@is sorry that she didn't come.

group_1.textRight: She was still sleeping...?
I see, that is why.
It is not quite a punishment,@but my reason is somewhat similar.
I, too, want to catch that fish.@As a way to apologize to a housemate.

group_1.textLeft: That fish?

group_1.textRight: Let me explain...
